name: Furever Felines
description:
FUREVER FELINES

Get sixteen cats before running out of money to win!  If one of your cats die, you will lose a lot of money, so make sure to keep them happy and healthy!  Food costs $10 to buy and one piece fills up a cat 1%.  You can press shift while buying food to buy ten times as much.  Be careful not to spend more money than you have...
